item.title: The last Neanderthal by Clarie Cameron
item.description: About the book Author: Cameron, Claire, 1973- Title: The last Neanderthal. Publication: City : Press, year.Toronto : Doubleday Canada, 2017. ISBN 9780385686785. 276 pages in the print edition. About the story This is a forthcoming book, which I read as a galley proof. I used the Adobe Digital Editions reader to read this DRM e-book, with NVDA (NonVisual Desktop Access) a by-donation screen reader that allows blind and visually-impaired people use computers and the internet.
